gobblin.data.management.copy

Class CloseableFsCopySource

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.source.extractor.extract.AbstractSource<String,FileAwareInputStream>
      • gobblin.data.management.copy.CopySource
        • gobblin.data.management.copy.CloseableFsCopySource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Source<String,FileAwareInputStream>

    public class CloseableFsCopySource
extends CopySource
    Used instead of CopySource for FileSystems that need be closed after use E.g SftpLightWeightFileSystem.

    Note that all FileSystem implementations should not be closed as Hadoop's FileSystem.get(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration) API returns a cached copy of FileSystem by default. The same FileSystem instance may be used by other classes in the same JVM. Closing a cached FileSystem may cause IOException at other parts of the code using the same instance.

    For SftpLightWeightFileSystem a new instance is returned on every FileSystem.get(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration) call. Closing is necessary as the file system maintains a session with the remote server.

    See Also:
    HadoopUtils.newConfiguration()
